channel.media:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God
channel.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God
channel.googleplay:description: John Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org; he is author of more than 50 books and travels regularly to preach and teach. New messages are posted to this podcast as they become available. Piper’s sermons, books, articles, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org. We want people everywhere to understand and embrace the truth that God is most glorified in us, when we are most satisfied in him.
channel.itunes:author: Desiring God
channel.title: John Piper Sermons
channel.description: John Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org; he is author of more than 50 books and travels regularly to preach and teach. New messages are posted to this podcast as they become available. Piper’s sermons, books, articles, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org. We want people everywhere to understand and embrace the truth that God is most glorified in us, when we are most satisfied in him.
channel.itunes:summary: John Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org; he is author of more than 50 books and travels regularly to preach and teach. New messages are posted to this podcast as they become available. Piper’s sermons, books, articles, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org. We want people everywhere to understand and embrace the truth that God is most glorified in us, when we are most satisfied in him.

item.title: The True Grace of Christian Camaraderie
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Grace is always personal. God mediates his grace to undeserving sinners through the warm affections of his divine family, the church.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: The True Grace of Christian Camaraderie
media:content.media:description: Grace is always personal. God mediates his grace to undeserving sinners through the warm affections of his divine family, the church.

item.itunes:summary: Grace is always personal. God mediates his grace to undeserving sinners through the warm affections of his divine family, the church.

item.title: Sons of Liberty and Joy: How a Christian Relates to the State
item.itunes:subtitle: How a Christian Relates to the State
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Christians claim their true citizenship in heaven. When we submit to earthly governments, we do so out of allegiance to Christ's eternal kingdom.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: Sons of Liberty and Joy: How a Christian Relates to the State
media:content.media:description: Christians claim their true citizenship in heaven. When we submit to earthly governments, we do so out of allegiance to Christ's eternal kingdom.

item.itunes:summary: Christians claim their true citizenship in heaven. When we submit to earthly governments, we do so out of allegiance to Christ's eternal kingdom.

item.title: Put the Attorneys to Work: How to Give the Bible Functional Authority in Your Speech and Writing
item.itunes:subtitle: How to Give the Bible Functional Authority in Your Speech and Writing
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Christian leaders should exude the Bible. They need to test everything they speak and write through the grid of biblical teaching.

item.title: Teach the Nations to Do the Impossible
item.itunes:subtitle: Completing the Whole Commission
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Jesus’s supreme authority empowers his Great Commission. We go, teach, and teach others to teach in the confidence that Jesus himself is with us.

media:content.media:title: Teach the Nations to Do the Impossible

item.title: Fifteen Dreams for the Future of Christian Hedonism
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Central to biblical Christianity is the pursuit of our joy in God. John Piper expresses fifteen hopes for the future of maximizing our joy in God.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: Fifteen Dreams for the Future of Christian Hedonism
media:content.media:description: Central to biblical Christianity is the pursuit of our joy in God. John Piper expresses fifteen hopes for the future of maximizing our joy in God.

item.itunes:summary: Central to biblical Christianity is the pursuit of our joy in God. John Piper expresses fifteen hopes for the future of maximizing our joy in God.

item.title: Volcanic Joy
item.itunes:subtitle: What Makes the Heart of God Happy
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: God’s volcanic passion for his own glory erupts in overflowing delight for his Son and unceasing joy for his children who share in God’s own glorious bliss.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: Volcanic Joy
media:content.media:description: God’s volcanic passion for his own glory erupts in overflowing delight for his Son and unceasing joy for his children who share in God’s own glorious bliss.

item.title: The Natural Act of Reading the Bible Supernaturally
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: In all true Bible reading, we think and God gives. We work hard to comprehend the authors’ intended meaning while we simultaneously rely on God to help us understand.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: The Natural Act of Reading the Bible Supernaturally

item.itunes:author: John Piper

item.itunes:author: John Piper

item.title: The Bondage of the Will, the Sovereignty of Grace, and the Glory of God
item.itunes:subtitle: Together for the Gospel
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: For Martin Luther, the issue of man’s bondage to sin, and moral inability to believe or obey, was the root issue of the Reformation — and the lynchpin of Protestantism.

item.itunes:subtitle: Living for God’s Glory in Marriage

item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: You love your spouse more when you love them less than God. If God is not central, your marriage will not glorify God as he intended.

item.title: The Glory of God as the Ground of the Mind’s Certainty and the Goal of the Soul’s Satisfaction
item.itunes:author: John Piper

item.title: All Authority in Heaven and Earth
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sovereignty of Jesus and His Unstoppable Mission
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: The audacity to make disciples for Jesus from followers of other lords and other religions is based on the rock solid foundation of the words — and the reality — “All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me.”
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: All Authority in Heaven and Earth
media:content.media:description: The audacity to make disciples for Jesus from followers of other lords and other religions is based on the rock solid foundation of the words — and the reality — “All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me.”

item.itunes:summary: The audacity to make disciples for Jesus from followers of other lords and other religions is based on the rock solid foundation of the words — and the reality — “All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me.”

item.title: How to Know the Will of God
item.itunes:subtitle: Finding Direction with the Renewed Mind
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: God wants to make you new more than he wants to reveal his secret plans for tomorrow. That’s his good purpose for you in all things.
item.itunes:keywords: sermons, messages, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God

media:content.media:title: How to Know the Will of God
media:content.media:description: God wants to make you new more than he wants to reveal his secret plans for tomorrow. That’s his good purpose for you in all things.
